channel.title: [PI] Adding Donator Icon? [PI]
channel.description:
How do I add a donator icon? I use "isDonator" to give a person donator through the character save. For some reason, the base I use will show the donor icon when you yell but not through regular chat. I'd like to make a way to show the Donor Icon is shown by if the "isDonator" is either 0 or 1.
Do you know how/why?
My Client.java
http://pastebin.com/SS5Kq7f8
Please note, that I have all the modicons setup and ready to go, I just don't know how to make the "isDonator" in the character save file affect if you have a donor crown or not. I know you need to edit the client.java, but how? I fail at client sided work >.<

item.title: [PI] Adding Donator Icon? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Gizcat Gizcat
item.description:
@Gizcat wrote:

IK that. I’m not sure how to make the logo be dependant on the isDonator part.

Read full topic
